extracted_playbook.title: Review Configuration Changes
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure any configuration changes are reviewed by system owners and administrators to avoid unwanted impacts.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Antivirus Signatures
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain up-to-date antivirus signatures and engines.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure systems have the latest security updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable File and Printer Sharing
extracted_playbook.description: Disable file and printer sharing services. If required, use strong passwords or Active Directory authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict User Permissions
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict users' permissions to install and run unwanted software applications. Do not add users to the local administrators’ group unless required.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when opening email attachments, even if the attachment is expected and the sender appears to be known.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Personal Firewall
extracted_playbook.description: Enable a personal firewall on agency workstations that is configured to deny unsolicited connection requests.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unnecessary Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unnecessary services on agency workstations and servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan and Remove Suspicious Email Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Scan for and remove suspicious email attachments; ensure the scanned attachment is its 'true file type'.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Web Browsing Habits
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor users' web browsing habits; restrict access to sites with unfavorable content.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution with Removable Media
extracted_playbook.description: Exercise caution when using removable media (e.g., USB thumb drives, external drives, CDs).

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Downloaded Software
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all software downloaded from the internet prior to executing.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Situational Awareness
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain situational awareness of the latest threats and implement appropriate Access Control Lists (ACLs).

extracted_playbook.title: Sign Up for CISA Alerts
extracted_playbook.description: Sign up to receive CISA’s alerts on security topics and threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Sign Up for CISA Vulnerability Scanning
extracted_playbook.description: Sign up for CISA’s free vulnerability scanning and testing services to help secure internet-facing systems from weak configuration and known vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA Cybersecurity Resources
extracted_playbook.description: Review CISA's cybersecurity assessment services for more information about vulnerability scanning and other services.

extracted_playbook.title: Acknowledge Contributions
extracted_playbook.description: Acknowledge contributions from Palo Alto Networks and IBM to this alert.

cve_id: CISA Best Practices for Security Posture
